com.amplifyframework.core.async

Class ReturningRunnable<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.core.async.ReturningRunnable<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the type of the result/return

    public abstract class ReturningRunnable<R>
extends Object
    Internal class to allow easy surfacing of synchronous and asynchronous operations. This class may change without notice and may not be reflected in the SDK versioning scheme.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private String operationDescription 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReturningRunnable()
      Default constructor.
      ReturningRunnable(String operationDescription)
      When an exception is thrown, it will be wrapped with another exception with a message specified by operationDescription.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void async(Callback<R> callback)
      Runs the code inside run() on a new Thread asynchronously and returns immediately.
      R await()
      Runs the code inside run() synchronously on the same thread this method is called.
      abstract R run()
      This method contains the underlying operation.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • operationDescription

        private final String operationDescription

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReturningRunnable

        public ReturningRunnable()
        Default constructor. When an exception is thrown, it will not be wrapped with another exception.

      • ReturningRunnable

        public ReturningRunnable(String operationDescription)
        When an exception is thrown, it will be wrapped with another exception with a message specified by operationDescription.
        Parameters:
        operationDescription - The message of the exception that wraps the underlying exception.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public abstract R run()
               throws Exception
        This method contains the underlying operation.
        Returns:
        Any result object of type R
        Throws:
        Exception - Any error from performing the underlying operation

      • await

        public R await()
        throws Exception
        Runs the code inside run() synchronously on the same thread this method is called.
        Returns:
        the result from the run() method
        Throws:
        Exception - error from the operation

      • async

        public void async(Callback<R> callback)
        Runs the code inside run() on a new Thread asynchronously and returns immediately.
        Parameters:
        callback - receives the result or error from the operation
